    • Method Detail

      • countChars

        private java.util.ArrayList<HuffmanSingleCharTuple> countChars(java.lang.String text)
        counts the characters in the text
        Parameters:
        text - the text to analyze
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing HuffmanSingleCharTuples for every character

      • generateHuffmanTree

        public void generateHuffmanTree(java.lang.String text)
        Generates a HuffmanTree from the text
        Parameters:
        text - the text to use for generation

      • encode

        public java.lang.String encode(java.lang.String text)
        encodes a String of text to a string of Bits using the HuffmanTree
        Parameters:
        text - the text to encode
        Returns:
        the encoded text as a String of Bits
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if text contains invalid characters (ones that were not in the text used to generate the HuffmanTree)
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the underlying HuffmanTree is not well formed or doesn't exist

      • decode

        public java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String code)
        decodes a String of Bits to a String of text
        Parameters:
        code - the String of bits in the encoded form
        Returns:
        the decoded text for the Supplied code
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if code contains invalid characters
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the underlying HuffmanTree is not well formed or doesn't exist
